name: Rise to Greatness Online Trivia | Word Play | 15 Questions

questions.text: Start with a four letter word meaning to lift, or to get out of bed.
Now rearrange the letters to get a father horse, or a way to address a king.
Now add a letter, no need to scramble, to get a word meaning an alarm sound, as on an ambulance.
Scramble those letters to get a word meaning to lightly wash with water.
Scramble these letters one more time to get the straps that control a horse
Now change a letter and do not scramble, to get a word meaning precipitates.
Add a letter and do not scramble to get a word meaning oats, wheat, and quinoa.
Now add a letter and scramble to get a word meaning ogling.
Change a letter and scramble to get a word meaning ripping, or crying, if pronounced differently.
Scramble the letters to get a smooth type of stone, commonly used as kitchen countertops.
Add a letter and scramble to get a word meaning more knotted, as in hair.
Add a letter and scramble to get multiple three-sided shapes.
Change a letter and scramble to get a word meaning chokes with the bare hands.
Change a letter and scramble to get a word meaning makes unfriendly.
Finally, scramble the letters to get a word meaning remarkable ability.
